replies.msg: Hksi 做野咁慢？ 你咩u

Internal Audit係專業，通常要求做過Big4 CPA，3rd line of defense

你要分清楚係AML/KYC/CDD (under Ops or middle office) 定係 FCC/AML Compliance (under compliance)先

如果係AML Compliance，2nd line of defense，都係比IA check + "小"

如果係AML/KYC/CDD呢啲垃圾工有手有腳求其有Top up /Open U degree都請，無專業可言，under Ops，1st line of defense，比AML Compliance check + "小".

IA >>> AML Compliance >>> AML/KYC/CDD

AML Compliance近年都無咁pro，之前缺人，好多HSBC KYC/ SCB CDD 成功轉型轉左去做Compliance拉低哂啲quality
